roleset.name: monitor, watch, serve as police for, enforcing the law
roleset.note: POLICE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'police' based on sentences in wsj and automaticexpansion via verbnet. (from police.01-v predicate notes)
POLICING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, police-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls captain-29.8-1. (from policing.01-n)

example.name: pretty simple, really
example.text: ``We can't police the many organizations that have sprung up in the last few years using part of our name.
example.arg: the many organizations that have sprung up in the last few years using part of our name

example.name: intransitive
example.text: Governments must compel private companies to aid them in their policing, the cost of which is unknown...
example.arg: the cost of which is unknown
